sentences.sContent: Rodgers and Hart’s music sounds as fresh and vital as the day it was written.
sentences.sCn: 罗杰斯与哈特的音乐现在听来还有刚写成时的那份清新和活力。

sentences.sContent: ...Changjiang has played a vital part in irrigation...
...We will lose a vital part of what has made humanity as a whole so successful as a species...
...So say good night sooner and it may help you stay active and vital to a ripe old age...
...Innovation is vital to driving economic progress...
...Workers of every rank are told these days that wide-ranging curiosity and continuous learning are vital to thriving in the modern economy...
...As food is vital for one's health...
...Campus construction is of vital importance not only to the physical development of students but to their mental health as well...

synos.tran: 至关重要的；生死攸关的；有活力的

phrases.pCn: 人口动态统计；生命的统计资料

remMethod.val: vit(生命) ＋ al → 事关生命的 → 生死攸关的

words.tran: 极其；紧要地；生死攸关地
活力，生气；生命力，生动性
[生物] 活力论；[生物] 生机说
赋予…生命；激发；使有生气

trans.tranOther: full of energy in a way that is exciting and attractive
